projects.title: ML-based weather forecasting
projects.excerpt: Weather predictor that ingests historical data to forecast short-term conditions with a reproducible pipeline.

details.heading: Highlights
items: Automated data cleaning, feature engineering, and train/validate splits.
Model training with cross-validation and metrics reporting.
Configurable forecasting horizons and evaluation windows.
Lightweight CLI/notebook workflows for quick iteration.
details.outcome: Actionable short-term forecasts with transparent metrics and a maintainable pipeline.

projects.title: Face comparison application
projects.excerpt: Detects and compares faces in images to estimate similarity and flag likely matches.

details.heading: Highlights
items: Drag-and-drop image ingestion with validation.
Face detection pipeline using Haar cascades.
Visual overlays communicating match confidence.
Modular architecture for alternative models.
details.outcome: Practical tool to quickly verify whether two images likely depict the same person.

projects.title: Unity game jam prototype
projects.excerpt: Fast-paced Unity prototype built under jam constraints, emphasizing readable combat and moment-to-moment control.

details.heading: Highlights
items: AI state machines with reusable decision helpers.
Movement blends and pathfinding tuned for mobile performance.
Boss encounters integrating telegraphed attacks and phase changes.
Combat systems integrated with progression and loot.
details.outcome: Playable vertical slice with tight controls and clearly telegraphed encounters.
